site.title: Vibe Coding Hamburg - Join Our AI Community
site.description: Join Hamburg's most vibrant AI-powered coding community. Connect with fellow developers, work on exciting projects, and explore the future of coding with AI tools.

header.title: Vibe Coding Hamburg
header.subtitle: Where AI meets creativity in Hamburg's tech scene
header.description: Join our community of developers exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and software development. Build projects, share knowledge, and shape the future of coding.

ai.title: AI-Powered Development
ai.description: Explore cutting-edge AI tools and techniques that are revolutionizing how we build software.

projects.title: Collaborative Projects
projects.description: Work together on real projects, from web apps to AI tools, and learn from each other.

community.title: Community Learning
community.description: Regular meetups, workshops, and coding sessions in Hamburg's vibrant tech ecosystem.

error.title: Verification Failed
error.invalid: Invalid or expired verification token. Please check your email for the correct link or request a new verification email.
error.general: Something went wrong during verification. Please try again or contact support.

verification.subject: Please verify your email address - Vibe Coding Hamburg
verification.title: Welcome to Vibe Coding Hamburg!
verification.subtitle: Please verify your email address to complete your registration
verification.message: Thank you for joining our community of developers exploring AI and software development in Hamburg!
verification.instruction: To complete your registration and start receiving community updates, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
verification.linkText: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expiry: This verification link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.ignore: If you didn't create an account with Vibe Coding Hamburg, you can safely ignore this email.
